tags.description: This is a basic campsite in  Hawke's Bay area. Camp at the edge of the park. Raft down the Ngaruroro River or have a go at fishing.
tags.name: Kuripapango (Ox Bow) Campsite

tags.description: This is a basic campsite in Hawke's Bay. A pleasant setting to camp or picnic in. There are day and overnight walks from here, as well as fishing and hunting, or canoeing on the Tutaekuri River.
tags.name: Lawrence Campsite
